results.name: Product of digits of (n written in base 7).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
program: (PARI) a(n) = my(v=vecprod(digits(n, 7))); n>0 && return(v) \\ _Felix Fröhlich_, Sep 09 2019
xref: Product of digits of (n written in base k): A309953 (k = 3), A309954 (k = 4), A309956 (k = 5), A309957 (k = 6), this sequence (k = 7), A309959 (k = 8), A309788 (k = 9), A007954 (k = 10).
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Aug 24 2019
